videopoker

Class Credit

  • java.lang.Object
    • videopoker.Credit

  • public class Credit
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains int objects to store the credit in different states

      • Credit

        public Credit(int c)
        Constructs an object of type Credit. Credit has 2 parameters: actual credit and initial credit. This constructor sets those 2 params with the given values:
